db.ti: Runner (Trainee front of house floor staff)

more.description: The purpose of your job as a Runner is to help the waiting staff to serve Guests. Your primary duties are to pick up food from the Kitchen and drinks from the bar and deliver these to the correct table in the restaurant. You also help clear and clean tables during service and set up tables for the next guest. During the first three months you will have intensive training and be expected to be ready for promotion in our career path road map. Our staff work an 8 hour roster, which may include split shifts, 6 days per week.
more.requirement: To join our team of Ladies and Gentlemen serving Ladies and Gentlemen you will need to impress us with your honesty, enthusiasm, willingness to learn and always happy smiling face. You will show that you are not afraid of long hours and hard work, and can be relied upon as a team member. Y our ability to speak and write in English will be an advantage. To meet the demands of the job you will need to be in good health.
